For UOB Evol card  I spent $490 on Google Pay  $380 on Shopee (online)  total $870 > $600. Have fulfilled the criteria?
Depends on $490 spend on which category
Shopee - If not top up Shopee Pay  should be counted
Bit unsure with the balance $100  after the two $250
Actually u spend $300 on Online & Contactless will do
Can consider spend on public transport  correct me if I am wrong
Google pay to pay online or gpay for mobile contactless?You definitely hit the 600 min spend. But if all is online spend  you only get $20. If is mobile contactless then $40.
Makan - Most likely no issue

So you have clocked both cashback categories. But because of "overspending"  your effective cashback rate is 4.6%  based on what you mentioned above. Anything else added will reduce your cashback rate further.
Thanks  it's fine. I'm aiming for the $40
If u using EVOL  best is to have a secondary card
So  on the $100 (on top of $250 for 2 criteria)  it can be included into any of the 2  namely mobile contact less (Google or Apple Pay) and online purchase
Like HSBC Revolution or Citi Rewards Card
Once u spend $300 on each category  use the secondary card to spend
Remember online payment using Google pay or apple pay is NOT mobile contactless

Mobile contactless is like paywave yes. Online payment using Google Pay/Apple Pay is like XNAP  Favepay  McDonald's App  payment on f&b website

Hi Everyone  if my credit card spend at dental is on 29/12/23  Fri. Will it charge to UOB one account spend for Jan 24?

Honestly highly unlikely to clear on the day itself and also unlikely to clear on the weekends...
